channel.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
channel.description:
[img]https://tactical-assault.com/assets/images/main/ta_logo.png[/img]
Tactical Assault
TA (Tactical Assault) is a full game based on Unreal Development Kit technology that will focus on combining tactical gameplay with arcade style and speed; while utilizing the immense power of the UT3 Engine.
The gameplay will be based on squad based team play like top first person shooters such as COD4, Counter Strike and TO:AoT,
It will pit the Strike Force against Mercenaries in intense round based objectives and stunning scenarios. Tactical Assault offers a wide variety of modern weaponry and beautifully rendered maps.
We are hard at work producing new maps that give the right feel for the game, they will reward team play while still allowing opportunities for individuals to shine and capture their glory. If you love action-packed first person shooters with great community involvement, then stay tuned.
The Dev Team
The Tactical Assault Development Team is an international effort. We have fans from all over the world as well. Many of the team members have years of experience working with game creation and are very active within UDK and FPS communities. The team is working hard everyday to ensure that our first release to the public will surprise you with its quality. The team is very friendly and welcomes any and all help. Feel free to stop by and apply for a position or just post your suggestions on the forum.
We have been very busy the last few months concentrating on creating weapons, characters, and maps for our new [url=https://tactical-assault.com/tamedia.html]media page[/url] which has just gone live!
Matt Lefevere has done a great job in rendering our handful of approved weapons in a UDK Scene. No, these are not in 3ds Max, Marmoset, or touched up in Photoshop.
These are all INGAME Screenshots!
[url=https://tactical-assault.com/assets/images/misc/MP5A3_Render.jpg][img]https://tactical-assault.com/assets/images/misc/MP5A3_Render.jpg_T.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://tactical-assault.com/assets/images/misc/Remington870P_Render.jpg][img]https://tactical-assault.com/assets/images/misc/Remington870P_Render_T.jpg[/img][/url]
More approved weapons can be found directly on our [url=https://tactical-assault.com]official site & forums[/url]
---------- older media --------
[url=https://www.youtube.com/user/TacticalAssaultChan#p/a/u/0/km5KrEz7Lqs]Tactical Assault Youtube channel[/url]
[url=https://www.tactical-assault.com][img]https://tactical-assault.com/assets/images/misc/tacticalops.gif[/img][/url]

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Sickmind
item.description:
We are back with another media release, and this time it’s an updated version of the classic TO: Crossfire map, Anvil ! This popular bombing objective map has been completely remade in the UDK with next-gen assets and lighting.

Matt and the team have really brought this level to life.

Preview Snapshop of our latest media:

We have also made great headway on weapon animations thanks to several new animators we’ve recruited after last month’s weapon media release.

Coming Soon…
December media release

For a festive holiday treat, we have a highly anticipated media release planned and currently being worked on that should certainly put a smile on your faces!!

Stay tuned…

For our full Media Release with additional information and images please check:
TA-website

---------- older media ----------

Tactical Assault media page

Read full topic

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Sickmind
item.description:
We are back with another media release, and this time it’s all about the things that go BANG!
In order to push faster towards our first Beta release, we need a Experienced Weapon Animators with UDK knowledge and a Uscript coder to assist our lead coders.

We have been very busy the last few months concentrating on creating weapons, characters, and maps for our new shiny media page which has just gone live! Link: https://tactical-assault.com/tamedia.html

Matt Lefevere has done a great job in rendering our handful of approved weapons in a UDK Scene. No, these are not in 3ds Max, Marmoset, or touched up in Photoshop.

These are all INGAME Screenshots!

More approved weapons can be found directly on our official site & forums:
https://tactical-assault.com/forum/ne…-2011%29-5202/

---------- older media--------
https://www.youtube.com/user/TacticalAssaultChan#p/a/u/0/km5KrEz7Lqs

Read full topic

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Holy fuckin’ quadruple post dude. If you weren’t a garg I would seriously consider that this isn’t just a plight for attiention and devs but actually trying to show an awesome product.

The fact that you can’t procure a team is proof enough that your game isn’t creative or original enough to bother giving a fuck about. You so desperate you’re resorted to going to some random game forum and practically spamming and 100% blatantly advertising.

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Sickmind
item.description:
It’s a new version of the oldschool game Tactical Ops.

It’s standing for almost 10 years !

The gameplay is far different than other games. All old Tactical Ops freaks are waiting to play Tactical Assault !

So there will be allready a small and close community when the game is released.

Because it’s a free game, we don’t have to aim at the big market and we can do what we want !

Everybody can download it. If you don’t like it just erase it from your harddrive so why don’t try it

Read full topic

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
Yes, we really need another one of these games. The last 250 were really not enough. You should also just remove all the weapons except the pistols and M4 since those are the only ones that people won’t call “n00b t00b”.

Read full topic

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Sickmind
item.description:
There’s a new update

WANTED A.S.A.P. !

  • Audio Coder

  • AI Coder

  • Action Script 2.0 Coder

For the job discriptions go to https://tactical-assault.com/apply.html?id=105

To apply, go to https://tactical-assault.com/wanted.html

Read full topic

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Sickmind
item.description:
It’s time for a small update.

For the full media release click here

TA onofficial youtube movie

Our modelers and artists have been racking up libraries worth of assets in recent months

Fusion:Electricity Substation

Fusion:Train Bridge

A few things going on :

-all 1st person weapon models are done
-working towards stripping our weapons to provide additional 3rd person and pickup model versions.
-started to skin and rig the 1st person player arms for animating, which will then lead us on to animating all the weapons… a slow and tedious task, but one that is critical!

On our next update we hope to show you more media, some in-game map screenshots and further news on our animations, character models… and oh yea… our teaser trailer as well which is still being developed!!

Sprinter Van

Merc Female Concept

For your info, we reached #2 on moddb last week from 1,649 mods/games which we feel is a testament to our fans!
If you haven’t already, please drop by and get “following” and rack up the support even more so

Plz visit our Forums to provide us with your feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: Sickmind
item.description:
There’s a new media release at the TA site.

Within 1 or 2 months in-game footage will be shown Yeehaaaah

A few images

TA menu

TA menu 2

Map Asset

For the full media release goto the TA-website

Feel free to visit our forums too. The forum will be only fully displayed after registering !

We got a lot of new team members and the TA steam engine is running on full speed again toward the first BETA, but we are still in need of a:

•Programmer
•Motion Graphic Artist
•Weapons Animator
•Female Voice Actor
•Environment Modeler
•Texture Artist
•2D Concept Artist

Read full topic

item.title: [FPS] Tactical Assault (Tactical Ops 3) developers needed
item.dc:creator: felipedomaul
item.description:
i’m just donwloanding maya,if i like modeling,count me in after i get some practice (a lot of practice actually )
suggestion : deep,strategy shooters are my favorite genre,take a look at mgo (metal gear online),and see if you can get any ideas out of it.an SOP based system would be a welcome addition,as it would greatly enhance teamplay.what it does is show location of linked teammates by an outline,their death spots and stun spots by an arrow,and allows voice commands like counter strike,just needs a marker system to tell a destination and it’s perfect

hope i helped

Read full topic
